attributes.action: Implement tighter lockdown restrictions to help fight Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details:
Close all non-essential stores e.g. cafes
Implement stricter enforcement of lockdown rules.
Close borders with other countries - only allow British citizens back to the UK and even then, implement a isolation period.
attributes.background: Covid-19 infection rates and deaths continue to rise. Hospital admissions are spiralling out of control and the NHS cannot continue on this trajectory. Too many people are still meeting outside and non-essential stores are open. Flights continue to run increasing the risk of infection spread.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions which call for similar actions: 

Adopt a Zero Covid strategy - full lockdown and close borders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571965

Start a second lockdown including closing schools to prevent spread of COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156

Implement full 6-week lockdown including closure of shops and businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550736

Enforce an extreme two-week lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156 

Close the borders until coronavirus is defeated: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165

Require all cafes to close during national lockdown, including for takeaway: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566768

Disallow all click and collect for non-essential retail during the lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567423
